sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
clusterID,
confidence_score,
globalID,
RecID,
posRawContainerRecID,
posFirstName,
posMiddleInitial,
posLastName,
posCustomerEmail1,
posCustomerEmail2,
posCustomerEmail3,
posCustomerPhone1,
posCustomerPhone2,
posCustomerPhone3,
n_address,
n_addr2,
n_city,
n_state,
n_zip9,
posFaceBookID,
posTwitterID,
market_id,
customer_type,
timestamp,
customer_since,
dtec,
posFirstNameSoundex,
posLastNameSoundex,
Alpha,
SourceSystem,
SourceSubSystem,
racProfitCenter,
racSalesNumber,
do_not_sell,
EntryID,
do_not_sell_request_date,
unsubscribe,
unsubscribe_date,
birthdate
FROM @{pipeline().parameters.CDPSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.CDPTableName} WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE YEAR(dtec)=@{pipeline().parameters.Year} AND MONTH(dtec)=@{pipeline().parameters.Month}
SELECT MAX(B_UPDDATE) as MAX_B_UPDDATE FROM @{pipeline().parameters.Sink_Country_Table_Name} WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT COUNT(1) as data FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_COUNTRY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Country_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'

SELECT 
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'@{pipeline().parameters.Country_Class_Name}' AS B_CLASSNAME,
ENTERPRISE_REF_COUNTRY_ID,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
COUNTRY_CODE_A2,
COUNTRY_CODE_A3,
COUNTRY_NAME,
COUNTRY_LOCAL_NAME,
COUNTRY_UN_CODE 
FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_COUNTRY WITH(NOLOCK) 
WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Country_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'
SELECT MAX(B_UPDDATE) as MAX_B_UPDDATE FROM @{pipeline().parameters.Sink_Currency_Table_Name} WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT COUNT(1) as data FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_CURRENCY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Currency_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'

SELECT 
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'@{pipeline().parameters.Currency_Class_Name}' AS B_CLASSNAME,
ENTERPRISE_REF_CURENCY_ID,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
CURRENCY_CODE,
CURRENCY_NAME
FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_CURRENCY WITH(NOLOCK) 
WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Currency_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'
SELECT MAX(B_UPDDATE) as MAX_B_UPDDATE FROM @{pipeline().parameters.Sink_Dma_Table_Name} WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT COUNT(1) as data FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_DMA WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Dma_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'

SELECT 
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'@{pipeline().parameters.Dma_Class_Name}' as B_CLASSNAME,
ENTERPRISE_REF_DMA_ID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_BATCHID,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
DMA_REGION
FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_DMA WITH(NOLOCK) 
WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Dma_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'
SELECT MAX(B_UPDDATE) as MAX_B_UPDDATE FROM @{pipeline().parameters.Sink_Time_Zone_EFF_DT_Table_Name} WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT COUNT(1) as data FROM GD_ENT_REF_TIME_ZONE_EFF_DT WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Time_Zone_EFF_DT_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'

SELECT 
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'@{pipeline().parameters.Time_Zone_EFF_DT_Class_Name}' as B_CLASSNAME,
ENT_REF_TIME_ZN_EFF_DT_ID,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
TIME_ZONE_EFFECTIVE_YEAR,
DST_START_DT,
DST_END_DT,
F_ENTERPRISE_REF_TIME_ZONE
FROM GD_ENT_REF_TIME_ZONE_EFF_DT WITH(NOLOCK) 
WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Time_Zone_EFF_DT_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'
